notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!

taskDescription: Gaia and Seth live in Osceola County in Florida, where the sales tax rate is 7.5%. They purchased some new camping gear. The price before taxes came to $784.62. How much do they pay after the sales tax is applied?
